segments.text: What do you think of the novel you just finished reading ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it a lot . It has a very funny beginning , I think . It attracts your attention the moment you begin reading it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like best about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the plot . It's so full of twists and turns . I also like the main character . She is so humorous and smart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of the ending ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ending is a bit weak . It's so abrupt , like those of most other detective stories .
segments.speaker: S2
